_aLatestUpdates._sText:
stripper

  • Added zombie detection to all triggers/button

  • Split defense now requires both top/bottom to be triggered in order to advance

  • Added practice mode (Playable once and only after map is beaten; Admins can trigger with !stage practice)

• Last section lasers are now insta-kill.

  • Chancing all the lasers damage type to DROWN so it can pierce through kevlar/armor.

  • Chancing the lasers textures to gradient to add more beauty

  • Added more lights to the map

  • Map is now compiled with HDR

_sText:
Chartapilus's CSS ZE

I | II | III | IV | V



Dedicated to song, Immortal Flame by Anna Yvette, Panda Eyes, and Teminite

My very first normal ze map to make

More lasers? yes
is it laser spam? ofc
the lasers sync with music? big YES

I usually hate to make laser map... but this one is different. I wanna sync the lasers with the music.
such a new thing for me to do after 2 surf maps before + first ever normal ze map.

I probably gonna make something similar to this for future mapping. 

CUZ SYNC LASERS WITH MUSIC IS SO MUCH FUN

please do not repost, edit, port the map without my permission. 
I took some effort when making this ;)

rar pass : if
